name: Twin Strikers
description:
In this crazy soccer game you'll need to learn how to control two player at the same time if you want to set up strategies efficient enough to overwhelm your opponent! (although even without beeing that good at the game, the fun is guaranteed)

Have fun with your friends playing match after match, train yourself in the training field and then check your progess against the A.I.s!

This still is just a little game, but with your support it colud grow a lot, maybe with new game modes or even online matches!

Thanks!

(WARNING: GAMEPAD REQUIRED)
